person.name: Hà Bùi
person.summary: Software developer with 7 years of experience, specializing in ERP system development and implementation. Proficient in full-stack development, automated testing, and IoT data handling. Strong problem-solving skills and a proactive approach to technology research and application.

person.name: Thái Thành Nguyên
person.summary: An AI enthusiast with 3 years of experience, specializing in Natural Language Processing (NLP) and large language models (LLMs). Passionate about exploring open-source models and their applications in advanced reasoning tasks.

responsibilities: Develop fully, locally-hosted multimodal RAG capable of handling multi-hop questions and image content.
Implement context-aware chunking and pre-processing of PDFs to extract tables and images.
Investigate open-source models that integrate with tool calling, structured output, and JSON format.
Design and implement multi-agent systems for collaborative task completion.
Utilize prompt techniques to leverage LLMs for generating test cases.
achievements: Contributed to the development of innovative GenAI solutions for the department.
Runner-up in an internal hackathon related to a car diagnostic chatbot.
Contributed to LangChain by integrating a llamaCpp, supporting instructed chat, chain, and tool calling.

responsibilities: Develop a graph convolutional network model for extracting key information from invoice images (OCR).
Fine-tune BERT by leveraging additional features such as word-level and character-level features.
Train with hard negative sampling in classification using contrastive learning and triplet loss.
